thread.title: 4 killed in Abu Dhabi as truck collides with vehicle
thread.title_full: 4 killed in Abu Dhabi as truck collides with vehicle

title: 4 killed in Abu Dhabi as truck collides with vehicle
text:
4 killed in Abu Dhabi as truck collides with vehicle Amira Agarib /Abu Dhabi   | Last updated on February 7, 2017 at 07.01 pm Share 
Picture used for illustrative purposes alone (Alamy Image) Abu Dhabi Police Ambulance service transferred the injured passenger to the Madinat Zayed Hospital. Four people - three Asians and a Somali - died on Tuesday and a fifth suffered serious injuries after a collision between a truck and a double cabin vehicle on Habashan Road in Al Gharbia in the Western Region. Read on: Parked car catches fire in Abu Dhabi According to Major Suhail Sayah Al Mazroui, chief of the Western Region Highways Section, preliminary investigations suggest that the driver of the double cabin vehicle failed to maintain control and swerved into oncoming traffic, leading to a head on collision with the truck.
